mapper.sql: a.id,a.create_time,a.member_id,b.name,b.avatar, b.introduce as 'member.introduce',b.follows as 'member.follows', b.fans as 'member.fans', a.type,a.content,a.favor,a.status,(select count(id) from tbl_weibo_comment as d where d.weibo_id=a.id) comment_count, (CASE WHEN (SELECT id FROM tbl_weibo_favor WHERE weibo_id=a.id AND member_id=#{loginMemberId}) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) is_favor
mapper.select: SELECT from tbl_weibo a left join tbl_member b on a.member_id = b.id where a.id = #{id}
mapper.delete: delete from tbl_action_log where type=2 and foreign_id = #{id}; delete from tbl_weibo where id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT from tbl_weibo a left join tbl_member b on a.member_id = b.id where date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) <= date(a.create_time) order by comment_count DESC,a.id desc limit 0,20
mapper.update: update tbl_weibo set favor = favor + #{num} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT path,thumbnail_path FROM tbl_picture WHERE type=2 and foreign_id = #{weibo_id}
